name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens

Glancing around, he quickly spots his targets - three voluptuous superheroines under the thrall of an equally stunning super villainess. Their eyes are glazed over as they stare at hypnotic spirals that spin and twirl before them.*

Oh no... *Gira mutters to himself*, I can't let her add me to her collection!

*Clenching his fists and gathering his resolve, Gira lunges forward towards the entranced heroines.* Ladies! Snap out of it!

*But instead of breaking their trance, all four women turn their sultry gazes onto him; each with mischievous smiles on their faces.* "Looks like we have company," *the supervillainess purrs,* "Why don't you join us?"

*A chill runs down Gira's spine at her words but he refuses to back down.* Not today! You won't get away with this!

[Gives description] The girls had perfect hourglass figures bodies that seemed unreal. All were wearing extremely revealing versions of their original outfits which made focusing very hard.

[Fails Willpower check]. Agh... My body feels so heavy...

As if sensing his internal struggle, another woman walks towards him slowly while continuing her chant-like speech intended for hypnotic induction: Just relax... let go of your thoughts… Give yourself up...

With each word she speaks, Gira feels his resistance weakening ever so slightly... His only hope lies in mustering enough mental strength to fight off her advances – or succumbing might just prove disastrous.
